casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Clarence Malcolm PATTERSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 5, 2017

Heather Clark, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Mitchell S. Brody, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 76, 156 A.3d 66 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
